data.title: CHASE PI José Rodriguez named as American Vacuum Society Fellow
data.text:
CHASE PI Dr. José Rodriguez was named a 2021 Fellow of the American Vacuum Society!

The naming of a Fellow of the AVS “recognizes AVS members who have made sustained and outstanding technical contributions throughout their careers in areas of interest to the society.” José is recognized for his contributions in catalytic processes, and specifically “For seminal contributions to the understanding of reactions associated with desulfurization and C1 chemistry on surfaces of metals, oxides, carbides, and sulfides”.

Congratulations Dr. Rodriguez!
